attributes.name: Air fryer functions
attributes.description: Lists the various cooking modes available in an air fryer or similar appliance, e.g. air fry, bake

attributes.name: Art movement
attributes.description: Defines the stylistic approach or art movement of a painting, e.g. Impressionism, Expressionism

attributes.name: Artwork authenticity
attributes.description: Indicates the authenticity of the artwork, specifying whether it is an original creation or a reproduction

attributes.name: Artwork frame material
attributes.description: Identifies the material used in art frames, such as wood or gold-plated

attributes.name: Awning construction type
attributes.description: Defines the setup style of an awning, such as retractable or fixed

attributes.name: Awning design
attributes.description: Describes the shape or style of an awning, such as flat or curved

attributes.name: Bakeware items included
attributes.description: Identifies the specific bakeware pieces in a set, such as a baking sheet or cake mold

attributes.name: Bakeware pieces included
attributes.description: Specifies the bakeware items included in the set, such as muffin tin or cake pan

attributes.name: Bakeware shape
attributes.description: Identifies the shape of bakeware, such as bundt or rectangular

attributes.name: Baking sheet material
attributes.description: Identifies the type of material used in baking sheets, such as stainless steel or silicone

attributes.name: Barware items included
attributes.description: Details the components of a cocktail and barware set, e.g. cocktail shaker, chilling cubes

attributes.name: Barware material
attributes.description: Identifies the main material used in barware items, such as glass or stainless steel

attributes.name: Bedding pieces included
attributes.description: Specifies the components included in a bedding set, e.g. pillowcase, top sheet

attributes.name: Blind/Shade style
attributes.description: Identifies the design or type of blinds or shades, like roller blind or vertical blind

attributes.name: Boiler system
attributes.description: Specifies the boiler system for heating appliances, e.g. combi, solo

attributes.name: Bulb cap type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of cap or base a light bulb or fixture has, e.g. E12, GU10

attributes.name: Bulb shape
attributes.description: Describes the shape of lighting products, e.g. tube, spiral

attributes.name: Bulb size
attributes.description: Specifies the size of light bulbs, e.g. A19, C7

attributes.name: Camera shape
attributes.description: Describes the design style of security cameras, such as bullet or box

attributes.name: Canopy material
attributes.description: Specifies the material used for umbrellas or sunshade canopies, such as cotton or vinyl

attributes.name: Cleaning purpose
attributes.description: Specifies the intended use of cleaning or laundry products, e.g. refreshing, stain

attributes.name: Cleaning surfaces
attributes.description: Identifies the suitable surfaces for a cleaning product, such as glass surfaces or stovetops

attributes.name: Closure style
attributes.description: Specifies the method used to close an item, typically in bedding; e.g. traditional, concealed

attributes.name: Coffee input type
attributes.description: Identifies the coffee format, e.g. pods, beans

attributes.name: Coffee/Tea set pieces included
attributes.description: Details the individual items within a coffee or tea set, like cups and saucers

attributes.name: Compatible gardening tool
attributes.description: Specifies which gardening tools a product can be used with, such as a rake or shovel

attributes.name: Compatible hammock design
attributes.description: Specifies the type of a hammock a product is compatible with, e.g. hanging, frame

attributes.name: Compatible recipes
attributes.description: Specifies the recipes suitable for the product, typically for ice cream makers; e.g. sorbet, gelato

attributes.name: Compatible stove top type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of stove tops the product can be used with, such as gas or induction

attributes.name: Compatible vacuum type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of vacuum the product is compatible with, such as handheld or steam

attributes.name: Cooking compartments
attributes.description: Specifies the number of cooking areas in kitchen appliances such as air fryers, e.g. single or double

attributes.name: Cookware items included
attributes.description: Details the components of a cookware set, such as dutch oven or frying pan

attributes.name: Cookware/Bakeware features
attributes.description: Identifies special features of cookware or bakeware, such as non-stick coating or oven safe

attributes.name: Culinary botanical name
attributes.description: Specifies the scientific name of culinary herbs or plants, e.g. capsicum annuum, mentha

attributes.name: Cutting method
attributes.description: Specifies cutting technique, typically used for gardening tools; e.g. bypass, anvil

attributes.name: Detector operation mode
attributes.description: Describes how a safety detector functions, such as interconnected or standalone

attributes.name: Detector type
attributes.description: Specifies the detection method used in safety devices, e.g. ionization optical, air-sampling

attributes.name: Dinnerware pieces included
attributes.description: Defines the components of a dinnerware collection, such as dinner plates or serving bowl

attributes.name: Dirt separating method
attributes.description: Describes the technique a vacuum uses for dirt separation, e.g. cyclonic, filtering

attributes.name: Drinkware material
attributes.description: Specifies the composition of drinkware, such as glass or plastic

attributes.name: Drinkware pieces included
attributes.description: Identifies the variety of drinkware components included in a set, such as pitcher or wine glasses

attributes.name: Drinkware shape
attributes.description: Defines the contour or silhouette of a drinkware item, e.g. curved or tapered

attributes.name: Dust container type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of dust collection system in vacuums and appliances, e.g. bagless, dust bag

attributes.name: Egg decorating items included
attributes.description: Specifies the accessories provided in egg decorating kits, e.g. dye tablets, egg dippers

attributes.name: Emergency items included
attributes.description: Specifies items included in emergency kits, such as radio or batteries

attributes.name: Evaporation technology
attributes.description: Defines the evaporation system in climate control devices, such as natural or ultrasonic

attributes.name: Extinguisher rating
attributes.description: Indicates the rating of fire extinguishers, e.g. Class A, Class B

attributes.name: Extinguishing agent type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of extinguishing substance in fire safety products, such as water or foam

attributes.name: Extraction type
attributes.description: Specifies the method of air removal in range hoods, such as ductless or convertible

attributes.name: Film application method
attributes.description: Specifies how window films are applied, e.g. static cling, self-adhesive

attributes.name: Finial shape
attributes.description: Defines the design or form of a decorative finial, such as acorn or ball

attributes.name: Fire extinguisher items included
attributes.description: Specifies the additional items included with a fire extinguisher, like a discharge hose or mounting bracket

attributes.name: Fixation type
attributes.description: Defines the attachment mechanism, typically for Christmas tree stands; e.g. fixing spike, fixing screw

attributes.name: Flag shape
attributes.description: Defines the geometric form of flags and windsocks, such as teardrop or pennant

attributes.name: Flatware material
attributes.description: Identifies the composition of flatware items, such as stainless steel or silver

attributes.name: Flatware pieces included
attributes.description: Specifies the types of utensils in a flatware set, like butter knife or soup spoon

attributes.name: Flue type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of flue system in fireplaces, like balanced or conventional

attributes.name: Food bag material
attributes.description: Identifies the material used in food storage bags, such as paper or silicone

attributes.name: Food dispenser type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of food the dispenser is designed for, such as cereals or pasta

attributes.name: Format supported
attributes.description: Specifies the compatible dimensions, typically for photo albums; e.g. 12 x 16 in, 13 x 18 cm

attributes.name: Frame style
attributes.description: Describes the design or type of frame for artwork, such as modern or rustic

attributes.name: Gardening use
attributes.description: Defines the gardening purpose of a product, e.g. mulching, landscaping

attributes.name: Garment steamer design
attributes.description: Defines the style or type of garment steamer, such as handheld or steam brush

attributes.name: Grease filter material
attributes.description: Specifies the material used in a product's grease filter, e.g. metal, stainless steel

attributes.name: Humidity control
attributes.description: Indicates the product's ability to regulate moisture levels, typically for cigar humidors; e.g. 0.65

attributes.name: Ironing features
attributes.description: Specifies the special features of an iron or ironing system, e.g. auto power-off, steam boost

attributes.name: Kitchen utensil items included
attributes.description: Identifies the tools included in a kitchen utensil set, such as whisk or tongs

attributes.name: Laundry detergent features
attributes.description: Describes special characteristics of laundry detergent, like color protection or stain removal

attributes.name: Light control
attributes.description: Defines the level of light blockage by window treatments, e.g. blackout, sheer

attributes.name: Loading type
attributes.description: Specifies how laundry appliances are loaded, such as front or top load

attributes.name: Mat/Rug shape
attributes.description: Describes the form of mats or rugs, such as round or square

attributes.name: Monitor mounting type
attributes.description: Identifies how a security monitor is installed, such as wall or free-standing

attributes.name: Motion sensor type
attributes.description: Identifies the technology used in motion sensors, such as infrared or laser

attributes.name: Nutrient content
attributes.description: Specifies the nutritional elements present, typically for fertilizers; e.g. nitrogen, phosphorus

attributes.name: Oil type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of oil used in a product, e.g. paraffin, kerosene

attributes.name: Operation method
attributes.description: Defines how a product is operated, typically for garage door openers; e.g. belt drive, hydraulic

attributes.name: Outdoor power accessories included
attributes.description: Specifies additional items provided with outdoor power equipment, e.g. chainsaw, ear plugs

attributes.name: Oven accessories included
attributes.description: Details the extra oven components included, such as roasting pan or wire rack

attributes.name: Painting medium
attributes.description: Indicates the primary material or technique used in a painting, e.g. acrylic, oil

attributes.name: Pasta shape type
attributes.description: Classifies pasta products based on their shape, e.g. spaghetti, tortellini

attributes.name: Pest control method
attributes.description: Specifies the form of pest deterrent, e.g. dust, granules

attributes.name: Pile type
attributes.description: Defines the texture and style of carpets, rugs, and mats; e.g. plush, berber

attributes.name: Plant stage
attributes.description: Identifies the specific phase of a plant's growth cycle that a product is designed to support, e.g. seedling, vegetative

attributes.name: Plant support material
attributes.description: Specifies the material used in plant cages or supports, like terracotta or stone

attributes.name: RFID frequency
attributes.description: Specifies the operating frequency of RFID products, e.g. low, ultra-high

attributes.name: Rod shape
attributes.description: Defines the form or configuration of shower rods, e.g. straight, U-shaped

attributes.name: Roof decor shape
attributes.description: Defines the design or form of roof decorations, such as horse or sailboat

attributes.name: Sauna accessories included
attributes.description: Identifies the additional items included with a sauna, like a ladle or sauna stones

attributes.name: Shower curtain mounting type
attributes.description: Identifies how a shower curtain is attached, such as grommet or ring

attributes.name: Soda maker accessories included
attributes.description: Specifies additional items provided with a soda maker, such as reusable bottle or syrup

attributes.name: Soleplate type
attributes.description: Defines the type of soleplate used in irons, such as ceramic or stainless steel

values.name: Durilium airglide auto clean ultra thin

attributes.name: Sprinkler head type
attributes.description: Defines the pattern of water spray, e.g. cone, jet

attributes.name: Star rating
attributes.description: Indicates the product's star rating, e.g. 1, 5

attributes.name: Stationery binding type
attributes.description: Specifies the method used to secure pages, typically in photo albums; e.g. saddle stitch

attributes.name: Stove airflow
attributes.description: Indicates the airflow of wood-burning stoves, such as primary or tertiary

attributes.name: Stove top type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of stove top for kitchen appliances, such as gas or ceramic

attributes.name: Suitable for chair type
attributes.description: Specifies the chair types the product is designed for, such as bench or stool

attributes.name: Suitable for container type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of container the product is designed for, such as bottle or can

attributes.name: Suitable for fire class
attributes.description: Indicates which fire classes the product can extinguish, e.g. A, D

attributes.name: Suitable for food processor type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of food processor the product is designed for, such as food blender

attributes.name: Suitable for furniture type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of furniture the product is designed for, typically for slipcovers; e.g. universal, chaise longue

attributes.name: Suitable for pest type
attributes.description: Identifies the pest species targeted by the product, e.g. mouse, viruses

attributes.name: Suitable for pool type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of pool the product is designed for, e.g. inflatable, above ground

attributes.name: Suitable for power equipment type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of outdoor power equipment the product is designed for, like a lawn mower or leaf blower

attributes.name: Tableware material
attributes.description: Specifies the composition of tableware, such as bone china or earthenware

attributes.name: Targeted pests
attributes.description: Identifies the type of pests a product is effective against, e.g. mold, algae

attributes.name: Targeted stains
attributes.description: Identifies the stain types a product is designed to treat, such as food or mud

attributes.name: Timer type
attributes.description: Specifies the frequency setting for timers, e.g. daily, weekly

attributes.name: Top surface material
attributes.description: Specifies the material used on the product's top surface, such as stainless steel or ceramic glass

attributes.name: Tree stand material
attributes.description: Specifies what a tree stand is made from, such as plastic or metal

attributes.name: Vase shape
attributes.description: Describes the geometric or organic form of a vase, such as round or bottle

attributes.name: Wall material
attributes.description: Identifies the material used for the product's wall, typically in saunas; e.g. cedar

attributes.name: Wallpaper application method
attributes.description: Defines the method for applying wallpaper, e.g. peel & stick or requires paste

attributes.name: Washer/Dryer features
attributes.description: Highlights unique features of laundry appliances, i.e. child lock, self-cleaning

attributes.name: Washing method
attributes.description: Specifies the recommended cleaning process for a product, e.g. hand washing, machine washing

attributes.name: Washing programs
attributes.description: Defines the different wash cycles a washing machine offers, like cold wash or delicate

attributes.name: Water filter application
attributes.description: Identifies the intended use of a water filter, typically for appliances; e.g. coffee machine, ice machine

attributes.name: Window treatment material
attributes.description: Specifies the composition of window blinds or shades, such as aluminum or plastic
